"Una obra maestra" describiría este juego. Me lo pasé al menos unas 10 veces en esta cuenta y en otras, y no me arrepiento, no pierde la esencia, y los gráficos siguen siendo buenos. Mucho mejor que su predecesor "Portal", además de tener un cooperativo con una historia que atrapa y muy divertido. Recomendado tanto para jugar solo como con amigos.
Si quieres un juego estratégico en primera persona, con buena historia, con buena banda sonora y que puedas jugar sin alterarte, este es tu juego.
En resumen, el mejor juego de la historia.
Очень интересная и командноя игра,когда играешь с другом это очень весело :3

一个人工智能的命运啊，当然要靠志我的奋斗，当然也要考虑到历史的行程。我就不知道我一个无所不能的 GLaDOS 怎么就变成土豆还差点被乌鸦吃了呢，后来 Wheatley 同志跟我讲，光圈科技已经决定了，让我来当土豆服务器，我说娘希匹另请高明吧，我也实在不是谦虚…后来我就随口念了两句诗，叫做：

“我曾经拥有着一切，转眼都飘散如烟。”

A challenging and rewarding experience the first time through in both the single-player and cooperative campaigns. After having left it for years and giving it another play-through, it still holds up, although a lot of the 'ah-ha' moments that made me feel like a genius the first time around were absent. Still a fun time to be had. 8.5/10

本来打完DO2很累要睡了，看传送门2下载好了就进来看一下，这一看就是5个小时...最后实在眼睛睁不开、智商用尽才去睡觉。第二天熬个通宵打完。第三天把传送门1也通了。
2比1多了很多道具和剧情，而且有双人模式，适合搞基。

史上所有电子游戏 TOP 10

简直是为我量身打造的游戏。

1.玩CS这种第一人称射击游戏，时间长了会晕的人，玩传送门你3分钟就晕了。
2.初中物理学太差的人，判断不了速度和方向。
Es un juego muy currado, para jugar con amigos.

Красивая, атмосферная и интересная игра головоломка... Игра со своим, своеобразным и по своему продуманным и проработанным миром и сюжетом... Про эту игру можно сказать, что она очень даже на любителя, но подача оформлена таким привлекательным и с юморком, но в то же время жестко и спецефически заманчивым образом, что оторватся будет сложно наверное любому...

Great game just like the first one

Who doesn't like Portal?!

This game is really challenging, humorous, and engaging. It's a lot more fun with another person than it is just as a single player game, and it's very very hard to pick up right where you left off if you haven't played this game in a few months (as many steam users can probably relate with).

I plan on finishing all of it, but it seems to lose my interest after a few levels of wracking my brain to solve the complicated puzzles. Oh but it's so rewarding when you finally do! :D Definitely give it a try if you've never played Portal or Portal2

still five years after its release, i love this game; its full of challengees, great visuals, got a simple yet intelligent story, and the odd bit of humour thrown in here and there. Would definitely recomend to everyone and hope it wins the vote!
Great puzzles mixed with funny dialogue, wonderful music, a near-perfect ending along with co-op and community made test chambers makes this a game you won't want to miss!

Awesome sequel to Portal 1.
- Gameplay has been upgraded with new mechanisms which is very welcome.
- The storyline is awesome. I love Glados.
- Very simple to use edition mode to create your personal levels. The player base has created a lot of levels and many of these are as good as the official ones.
- Multiplayer mode which I want to try but looks very fun.

You won't find another game that good and that cheap.

its good

This game is fantastic it has been one of my favourite games for a long time. Both the single player and co-op stories are fantastic. There are plenty of mods on 3rd party websites such as moddb.com there are also many maps on the wrokshop. The mechanics are brilliant. The game is very humourous, there are a lot of easter eggs. This game can be played mostly without playing Portal 1 you will miss a few refrences but it does not hinge completly on having played the first game. However there are microtransactions (cosmetics for characters in co-op) but they have not been implemented yet, or have been de-implemented.
If you havent played this yet, what are you doing with your life? :D
It's fucking awesome.
